title: RFK Jr. grilled by Senate over COVID vaccine restrictions, CDC
shortDescription: Health Secretary Robert F. Kennedy Jr. faced tough bipartisan questioning about limiting COVID vaccines to older and high-risk Americans.

title: Trump renaming Defense Department. What to know about War Department.
shortDescription: Congress created the War Department in 1789 to oversee the Army, Navy and Marines. It was changed to the Defense Department in 1949.

title: Trump again floats revoking Rosie O'Donnell's US citizenship
shortDescription: President Trump renewed his feud with comedian Rosie O’Donnell by threatening to revoke her U.S. citizenship again.

title: Judge rules with Harvard in funding battle. Did Barron Trump apply there?
shortDescription: A judge ruled with Harvard in a battle for federal funding. When Trump started targeting the school, people wondered: Did Barron Trump get rejected?

title: How the First Amendment protects 'South Park's Trump mockery
shortDescription: The show has targeted the administration throughout this season, portraying everything from Trump naked to DHS Secretary Kristi Noem shooting dogs.

title: Joe Biden recently had skin cancer surgery, spokesperson says
shortDescription: A spokesperson told USA TODAY that the former president had Mohs surgery, a common procedure for treating skin cancer.

title: Trump praises RFK Jr. after Senate hearing. 'He's got a different take.’
shortDescription: Kennedy faced blistering questions in a Sept. 4 Senate hearing about his leadership of the Centers for Disease Control and Prevention.

title: Trump to sign order renaming Pentagon the 'Department of War'
shortDescription: President Donald Trump will sign an executive order on Sept. 5, changing the name of the Department of Defense back to the "Department of War."

title: Judge blasts Trump DOJ after another DC grand jury refuses felony case
shortDescription: The move, following numerous other refusals, is another setback for Trump’s handpicked U.S. attorney in DC, former Fox News host Jeanine Pirro.

title: 'The robots are here'. Melania highlights AI during White House tech day
shortDescription: It was a day to spotlight the role of tech as CEOs - minus Elon Musk - met at the White House with President Trump. Melania hosted her own event on AI.

title: DC challenges Trump’s troop deployment
shortDescription: Officials in Washington, D.C., filed a lawsuit against the Trump administration, alleging his National Guard deployment violates federal law.

title: NY AG appeals Trump's $500 million fraud case to state's highest court
shortDescription: New York Attorney General Letitia James filed an appeal over a half-billion-dollar real estate fraud penalty against President Donald Trump.

title: RFK Jr. grilled at Senate hearing over CDC firings
shortDescription: Health and Human Services Secretary Robert F. Kennedy Jr. was grilled at a Senate hearing over recent CDC firings and his vaccine guidance.

title: Donald Trump suggests deploying National Guard in New Orleans
shortDescription: President Donald Trump suggested he may send National Guard troops to New Orleans rather than Chicago as part of his expanding crime crackdown.

title: Court blocks Trump’s $2 billion funding cuts to Harvard over free speech
shortDescription: A US federal court has overturned the Trump administration’s decision to cut billions in funding to Harvard University, ruling that the move violates the school’s free speech rights.
